review: I've had this unit for just over a year and it has worked without issue since I purchased it. I have replaced my cable subscription to only Apple TV. and the apps that are on the system. I had another system prior to this that claimed to be true HD and wasn't, the connection was ok on that system but the video often lagged and would not play. I have not experienced that on this unit and I will admit I don't have the fastest internet from my ISP and even with 3 people online at a time I very rarely if ever experience a lag from the system.Pros:* Sleek Design* Easy To Setup* Amazing Connection Speed To WiFi Flawless video quality 1080p HD* Self Updates* Lots of channels* Never without entertainment* Mirror your iPad/iPhone without a loss in qualityCons:* Remote is annoying its nice and sleek but constantly getting misplaced due to size* Black design is nice but shows any dust that is near the system.* No notification when channels are updated or added
